about_the_game: Raid On Rift is a video game featuring a turn-based strategy system with customizable teams made of unique characters. Our game centers on the fearsome and rugged Space Pirates as they face off against the militant and legendary Galactic Navy, fighting on an alien mining outpost to fight over a coveted and extremely valuable source of ore. Our game also includes lan multiplayer capabilities so that players can play with their friends across separate devices. Furthermore explore the legend of the characters and learn their unique move sets within our games tutorial, story, and helpful UI features. Raid on Rift features an extremely dynamic playstyle, as their is draft phases, placement phases, and neutral zone phases before the game even begins. Challenge your friends and learn new strategies and army's to master your playstyle! Whether your interested in the lore or the infinite strategy variants and opportunities, our game has something to offer to gaming enthusiasts alike.

Our game centers on the fearsome and rugged Space Pirates as they face off against the militant and legendary Galactic Navy, fighting on an alien mining outpost to fight over a coveted and extremely valuable source of ore. Our game also includes lan multiplayer capabilities so that players can play with their friends across separate devices. Furthermore explore the legend of the characters and learn their unique move sets within our games tutorial, story, and helpful UI features. Raid on Rift features an extremely dynamic playstyle, as their is draft phases, placement phases, and neutral zone phases before the game even begins. Challenge your friends and learn new strategies and army's to master your playstyle! Whether your interested in the lore or the infinite strategy variants and opportunities, our game has something to offer to gaming enthusiasts alike.

short_description: Be prepared to defend your Ore in this multiplayer turn-based strategy game! Take control of the Imperial Navy or the dreaded Space Pirates, and use a variety of crewmates to take your opponent's Ore before they take yours!
